      This method places lakeTile for greedy Player such that it can make best possible dedication in next move or gets maximum number of lantern cards that leads to dedication and if number of cards are same then it checks maximum favor Token.

    • Method Detail

      • placeLakeTile

        public void placeLakeTile(GameEngine gameEngine,
                 Player player)

        This method places lakeTile for greedy Player such that it can make best possible dedication in next move or gets maximum number of lantern cards that leads to dedication and if number of cards are same then it checks maximum favor Token.

        Parameters:
        gameEngine - contains the entire state of the game
        player - current player
